partnerFullName.label: What is your partner’s full name?
partnerFullName.length: Your partner’s full name must be 500 characters or less.

partnerHasPreviousNames.legend: Has your partner been known by any previous names?
partnerHasPreviousNames.hint: For example, maiden names or previous married names.
partnerHasPreviousNames.required: Select yes if your partner has been known by any other names.

partnerPreviousNames.label: What were your partner’s previous names?
partnerPreviousNames.length: Your partner’s previous names must be 500 characters or less.

partnerNino.label: What is the your partner’s National Insurance number?
partnerNino.hint: It’s on their National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, ‘QQ 12 34 56 C’.
partnerNino.required: Enter your partner’s National Insurance number.
partnerNino.format: Enter your partner’s National Insurance number in the correct format.

partnerRegisteredBlind.legend: Is your partner registered blind or severely sight impaired?
partnerRegisteredBlind.required: Select yes if your partner is registered blind or severely sight impaired.
